Class MainExpRecycler

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
      • com.haidarh.jwork_android.ui.main.MainExpRecycler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.ExpandableListAdapter, android.widget.HeterogeneousExpandableList

    public class MainExpRecycler
extends android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
    The Main Expandable Recycler, Adapter untuk data pekerjaan dan recruiter dari main activity
